data.text: @Mezo87393734 @jaeager11 @cnnphilippines there are good bad debts and good debts. You should have learned that in High school/college at least. And there are also crisis and recovery reasons why a country loans.  What the media should disseminate is how a govt manages this and what people's options are.

@Mezo87393734 @jaeager11 @cnnphilippines you're just blind & myopic.Dont you see the new airports, seaports, new roads, skyways, new eJeeps, messy electric wires, new navals ships and new blackhawks an plane, new clear and organized public markets. All these Build3x and other initiatives are aimed to comfort everyone.
@cnnphilippines Pabayaran yan kay Atong Ang at kay Grechen 😃😁

@cnnphilippines Sh*********t we are all loosers…but the people running our country..the politicians who keep their bank accounts hidden..nagpapayaman…millions to billions na nakatago..ordinaryo pinoy wala na pulubi na lalo.
@cnnphilippines I will be pleased if the debt will decreased even $1 trillion in the next 6 yrs if She will be the president.
@cnnphilippines Iyan ang mamanahin ni LENI 12T utang ni Du30 ! parang Si Cory pinamanahan ni Marcos ng 26B$ na Utang!
@cnnphilippines And more than half of that went to the corrupt officials in the government. Filipinos should vote for leaders who are not robbers and stealers!
